name: RSI Diagnostics (Smoke Test)
description: Diagnostic strategy for smoke test validation. RSI<30 BUY, RSI>70 SELL. This strategy is designed to produce trades on any reasonable dataset for pipeline health checks.

entryConditions.description: Enter long when RSI drops below 30 (oversold)

exitConditions.description: Exit long when RSI rises above 70 (overbought)

backtestMetadata.expectedBehavior: Should produce >0 trades on any 24h+ dataset with volatility

notes: This is a DIAGNOSTIC strategy for smoke tests only
DO NOT use for live trading
DO NOT display in normal strategy list
Used by BacktestSmokeTest.kt and CI/CD pipeline
Guarantees trade generation for health checks
